title: Global No-Stop Rule
description: Applies to all agents, commands, and plan execution.

autoContinue.description: Automatically continue if chunk limits are reached.

chunkSize.description: Approximate line size per output chunk.

noConfirmation.description: Prevents all agents from asking for user-confirmation.

noStop.description: Prevent stopping early due to output length.

autoReplay.description: If output is truncated, automatically send the next chunk.
